verses.verse: זְכֹ֤ר <WH2142> Remember יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD מֶֽה־ <WH4100> what הָ֣יָה <WH1961> has befallen לָ֔נוּ [הַבֵּיט כ] (הַבִּ֖יטָה <WH5027> behold ק) וּרְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> and behold אֶת־ <WH853> חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2781> our reproach
נַחֲלָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH5159> Our inheritance נֶֽהֶפְכָ֣ה <WH2015> is turned לְזָרִ֔ים <WH2114> to strangers בָּתֵּ֖ינוּ <WH1004> our houses לְנָכְרִֽים׃ <WH5237> to aliens
יְתוֹמִ֤ים <WH3490> We are orphans הָיִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1961> have become [אֵין כ] (וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> else ק) אָ֔ב <WH1> A father אִמֹּתֵ֖ינוּ <WH517> our mothers כְּאַלְמָנֽוֹת׃ <WH490> [are] as widows
מֵימֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH4325> our water בְּכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> for money שָׁתִ֔ינוּ <WH8354> We have drunken עֵצֵ֖ינוּ <WH6086> our wood בִּמְחִ֥יר <WH4242> A price יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <WH935> comes

עַ֤ל <WH5921> are at צַוָּארֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH6677> Our necks נִרְדָּ֔פְנוּ <WH7291> [are] under persecution יָגַ֖עְנוּ <WH3021> we labour [לֹא כ] (וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not ק) הֽוּנַֽח־ <WH5117> [and] have no rest לָֽנוּ׃
מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian נָתַ֣נּוּ <WH5414> We have given יָ֔ד <WH3027> the hand אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> [and to] the Assyrians לִשְׂבֹּ֥עַֽ <WH7646> to be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> with bread

אֲבֹתֵ֤ינוּ <WH1> Our fathers חָֽטְאוּ֙ <WH2398> have sinned [אֵינָם כ] (וְאֵינָ֔ם <WH369> else ק) [אֲנַחְנוּ כ] (וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves ק) עֲוֹנֹתֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5771> their iniquities סָבָֽלְנוּ׃ <WH5445> and we have borne
עֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> Servants מָ֣שְׁלוּ <WH4910> have ruled בָ֔נוּ פֹּרֵ֖ק <WH6561> over us [there is] none that doth deliver אֵ֥ין <WH369> There מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> [us] out of their hand

בְּנַפְשֵׁ֙נוּ֙ <WH5315> with [the peril of] our lives נָבִ֣יא <WH935> We gat לַחְמֵ֔נוּ <WH3899> our bread מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> of the sword הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness
עוֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH5785> Our skin כְּתַנּ֣וּר <WH8574> like an oven נִכְמָ֔רוּ <WH3648> was black מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because זַלְעֲפ֥וֹת <WH2152> of the terrible רָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> famine
נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> the women בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> in Zion עִנּ֔וּ <WH6031> They ravished בְּתֻלֹ֖ת <WH1330> [and] the maids בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

שָׂרִים֙ <WH8269> Princes בְּיָדָ֣ם <WH3027> by their hand נִתְל֔וּ <WH8518> are hanged up פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the faces זְקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> of elders לֹ֥א <WH3808> were not נֶהְדָּֽרוּ׃ <WH1921> were not honoured
בַּחוּרִים֙ <WH970> the young men טְח֣וֹן <WH2911> to grind נָשָׂ֔אוּ <WH5375> They took וּנְעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> and the children בָּעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> under the wood כָּשָֽׁלוּ׃ <WH3782> fell
זְקֵנִים֙ <WH2205> The elders מִשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> from the gate שָׁבָ֔תוּ <WH7673> have ceased בַּחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> the young men מִנְּגִינָתָֽם׃ <WH5058> from their musick
שָׁבַת֙ <WH7673> is ceased מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <WH4885> The joy לִבֵּ֔נוּ <WH3820> of our heart נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> is turned לְאֵ֖בֶל <WH60> into mourning מְחֹלֵֽנוּ׃ <WH4234> our dance

נָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> is fallen עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> The crown רֹאשֵׁ֔נוּ <WH7218> [from] our head אֽוֹי־ <WH188> woe נָ֥א <WH4994> I beseech thee לָ֖נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <WH2398> unto us that we have sinned

עַל־ <WH5921> Because זֶ֗ה <WH2088> of this הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become דָוֶה֙ <WH1739> is faint לִבֵּ֔נוּ <WH3820> For this our heart עַל־ <WH5921> Because אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these חָשְׁכ֥וּ <WH2821> are dim עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> for these [things] our eyes
עַ֤ל <WH5921> Because הַר־ <WH2022> Because of the mountain צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> of Zion שֶׁשָּׁמֵ֔ם <WH8074> which is desolate שׁוּעָלִ֖ים <WH7776> the foxes הִלְּכוּ־ <WH1980> walk בֽוֹ׃ פ
אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> remainest כִּסְאֲךָ֖ <WH3678> thy throne לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> from generation וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> to generation
לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why לָנֶ֙צַח֙ <WH5331> us for ever תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֔נוּ <WH7911> Wherefore dost thou forget תַּֽעַזְבֵ֖נוּ <WH5800> [and] forsake לְאֹ֥רֶךְ <WH753> us so long יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> age

הֲשִׁיבֵ֨נוּ <WH7725> Turn יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> thou us unto thee O LORD אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about [וְנָשׁוּב כ] (וְֽנָשׁ֔וּבָה <WH7725> Restore ק) חַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH2318> renew יָמֵ֖ינוּ <WH3117> our days כְּקֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> as of old

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo מָאֹ֣ס <WH3988> But thou hast utterly מְאַסְתָּ֔נוּ <WH3973> refuse קָצַ֥פְתָּ <WH7107> wroth עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and עַד־ <WH5704> art מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> us thou art very
